_source.text: #3??? Better than Johnny Unitas, Bart Starr, Dan Marino, Otto Graham, Sammy Baugh, and Peyton Manning???? Very tough to rank QB's in todays game with the guys in a non passing league from years ago..IMO top 5 Maybe............
